successes.title: Axis360: modular motion control for cameras
successes.description: A compact, motorized tripod head and slider for dynamic video and timelapse photography.

Pledges.description: Axis360 Basic • Motorized panning tripod. Includes Axis360 motor, controller, tripod, and ballhead. Choose a reward below to add tilt kit, slider, or multi-axis motion. Expected retail price is $450. International customs charges may be collected on delivery. Thank you!

Axis360 Plus • Motorized pan or tilt. Includes all components of the Axis360 Basic reward above plus a tilt kit.  Choose a reward below to add slider or multi-axis motion. Expected retail price is $550. International customs charges may be collected on delivery. Thank you!
EARLY BIRD Axis360 Pro • Help us get started and get one of the very first Axis360 Pro kits! Expected retail price is $900. International customs charges may be collected on delivery. Thank you!

Axis360 Pro • Motorized pan, tilt, or slide! Includes all components of Axis360 Plus reward and a slider. Choose a reward below to multi-axis motion control. Expected retail price is $900. International customs charges may be collected on delivery. Thank you!

Axis360 Pro - June Delivery • Motorized pan, tilt, or slide! This is the same as the Axis360 Pro reward above, but will be shipped in June. Choose a reward below for two or three axis motion control. Expected retail price is $900. International customs charges may be collected on delivery. Thank you!

Two Axis360 • Two axis motorized pan, tilt and/or slide. Includes all components of Axis360 Pro reward above and an additional Axis360 motor and controller. Choose the Three Axis360 reward below to add simultaneous three axis motion. Expected retail price is $1,300. International customs charges may be collected on delivery. Thank you!

Three Axis360 • Three axis motorized pan, tilt and slide. Includes all components of Two Axis360 reward above and an additional Axis360 motor and controller. Expected retail price is $1,700. International customs charges may be collected on delivery. Thank you!

Three Axis360 - June Delivery • Three axis motorized pan, tilt and slide. This is the same kit as the Three Axis360 reward above, but will be shipped in June. Expected retail price is $1,700. International customs charges may be collected on delivery. Thank you!

Three Axis360 - July Delivery • Three axis motorized pan, tilt and slide. This is the same kit as the Three Axis360 reward above, but will be shipped in July. Expected retail price is $1,700. International customs charges may be collected on delivery. Thank you!
